lyrics.text:
Ke tau tuku kolōlia,
Ki he ‘Otua mo’oni,
Ko hotau mo’ui’anga,
Mo e kakai kotoa pē.

Ko e poto‘anga ia,
Ki he kakai loto vale;
Ko e maama’anga ia,
Ki he kakai fakapo’uli.

Ko e ‘Otua totonu,
Pea ‘afio ma’u ai pē,
Ko e Tamai, mo e ‘Alo,
Mo e Laumālie Lelei.

Ko e tefito pē taha,
Ka ‘oku huafa tolu;
Ko hotau ‘Otua ia,
Mo māmani kotoa pē.
